Articles.Content:
Hey guys

 

I have a solar probe with a Communotron  88-88, a Starlink relay network around Kerbin, and a giant relay rover about 2 km north of the KSC. I expected the comms to go either via relay then to a station or via the Relay rover to the KSC. What ended up happening was the comms came from Harvester Massif via a satelite, went through the planet to the rover, then finally yo my solar probe. Sometimes this also happens on rockets that have Communotron 16s, and that decreases signal significantly. Can someone please explain to me what is going on and how to fix it?

If you don't want to have other commnet stations than the KSC, you can change thi in the difficulty settings, by selecting 'settings' from the pause menu. I think the option is named 'allow ground stations' or the like.
